summary: An Ordinance approving the assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 1158, for the improvement of Twenty-fourth Avenue North from East Madison Street to East Ward Street, all in the City of Seattle, by constructing concrete sidewalks, wooden curbs, gutters, crosswalks and other appurtenances therein, under Ordinance No. 12927 and assessing the amounts thereof against each parcel and lot of land and part thereof shown in said roll, and providing for the collection thereof.
